Reviews.Title: I COULD RATE IT ZERO STAR IF I COULD
Reviews.Author: ILI
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH ANY PHONE COMPANY IN US IF YOU WANT TO HAVE DATA PLAN ON YOUR PHONE. IT IS UNLOCKED WHICH IS RIGHT BUT YOU CAN ONLY MAKE PHONE CALLS AND SEND TEXT MESSAGES. NO INTERNET AT ALL. AND THE COMPANY EVEN DON'T GIVE ME REFURN AND REFUND!!! WHAT THE HELL!!!!

Reviews.Title: No internet at all
Reviews.Author: Smile.
Reviews.Content: this phone does not has internet at all. I even do not know what should I do so? I wish I could get refund. this is just terrible. I even just notice that.

Reviews.Title: Cute one
Reviews.Author: Shin
Reviews.Content: Super cute one. Just not good at using it yet. Not as good as iphone, but sony's products are always unique. I like sony

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: santiago
Reviews.Content: muy bueno satisfecho con la compra lo compraria de nuevo  ademas a la persona le quedo perfecto muy buena compra

Reviews.Title: Nice color~
Reviews.Author: Quan Jingyao
Reviews.Content: Really cute phone!!And I never have a cell like this so cute and pinky~there are a lot of girls love my cell ^^
